articles.title: Game of Thrones prequel paused as Hollywood writers' strike continues - The Guardian
articles.description: Production on final season of Stranger Things also halted as strike by thousands of US film and television writers blows out to almost a week
articles.content: The writing of a coming Game of Thrones prequel has been halted, and production on the final season of Stranger Things paused, as a nearly week-long strike by thousands of film and television writers… [+2749 chars]

articles.title: The closest divorcées EVER? How Sarah Ferguson fulfils her promise to 'always stand by' Andrew - Daily Mail
articles.description: FEMAIL takes a look back at how Andrew and Sarah have become the closest ex-couple in the Royal Family's history - after she joined the Duke at the Windsor concert last night.
articles.content:
They've been divorced for over 27 years now - but that hasn't stopped Prince Andrew and Sarah Ferguson from maintaining an exceptionally close relationship.
